text: So while i really do ilke looking at the stats of a page and how it performs, sometimes when I am in the admin area, i just want to jump to the page without the performance metrics. Would it be possible to add another button for a jump link rather than it be in a dropdown?
to clarify - you’re wanting the button to be the “view” link essentially, that takes you right to the live page(not in the editor and not the page dashboard) correct?
would just jump you right to the live page
pretty certain this can be done via the extension. I’m with you, I agree this should be a feature.
would be cool if in the template editor there was a function for viewing email template as a specific contact

created an issue for this. idk how soon it’d get added kinda depends on if HS will add it themselves.
<https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/issues/189>
